name: Stem the tide
description:
Beware of the tide because in this game, the tide is going to "rise and fall" every time you move ! In this game, your goal is rather simple : save every citizens lost throughout the archipelago, take the risk of drowning to reach them, and use lifesavers to travel easier between islands.

Controls : Use arrows to move your character, right-click on it to place a lifesaver where you are, and use right-click on any village to purchase the lifesavers.

PS : This is the very first game I publish, and the first I take part in a Game Jam, please be kind (especially about graphisms, I'm not that much of a great artist). It was made with Construct 2.
Feel free to send me feedbacks !
